name: Steam Rolled
description:
Are you ready for retro war?

In this Atari style 2D shooter you only have one goal: survive the cruelties of war for as long as you can! Will you be able to single-handedly withstand the firepower of an entire army? Will you be metaphorically steam-rolled by sheer manpower? Or will you take it literally and end up being smushed by an enemy tank?

One thing is of utmost importance: keep your calm! When push comes to shove and the situation seems hopeless, breathe in and trust your basic instincts. Time seems to move so slowly when you bravely stand up against the imminent danger.

This game was developed as a submission for Weekly Game Jam 153.

Theme of the jam: Roll. 

Team members:

- Yeti 47 (a. k. a. Lucky Goodrich)

- gsihaj5

Future plans:

- Implement more playable units and AI team mates (paramedics, rocket launcher units, just to name some).

- Add more enemy types. 

- Add an actual pause screen. 

- Integration of online API for highscores and possibly achievements.
